price: Sivyo hivyo, bali anaye timiza ahadi yake na akamchamngu basi Mwenyezi Mungu huwapenda wachamngu.
arabic: بَلَىٰۚ مَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِعَهۡدِهِۦ وَٱتَّقَىٰ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
footnotes: Hakika ni kweli wamemzulia uwongo Mwenyezi Mungu. Kwani mwenye kumrejeshea mwenyewe haki yake na akamtimizia kwa wakati wake kama alivyo ahidi, na akamwogopa Mwenyezi Mungu, wala asipunguze kitu wala asiakhirishe, huyo basi atapata mapenzi ya Mwenyezi Mungu kwa sababu amemcha Yeye.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: balā man awfā biʿahdihi wa-ittaqā fa-inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-mutaqīna
